song_lyric:
作曲 : BUGMAN
 作词 : 天府事变
Mixed by mAjorHon
时空斗转星移
我在火光四溅降临
四处街区寂静电光火石啪啪
燃烧零星
大脑神经眩晕
断裂又残缺的记忆
线索太乱
拼凑起来我来自未来
家被外星物种破坏生灵涂炭
勾结虚妄的人
狼狈为奸
把枪口对准平民
弥漫的硝烟
来自无厌的贪婪蒙蔽和平
被越过的防线 所见
残垣断壁已杳无人烟
擦亮战士的剑尊严
绝对反击还击为我世界
敌人想要把我摧毁
我让我的兄弟相信
我的机甲已被追尾
听到了警报的声音
请不要伤心
如果今天我会死
孩子们记住他的名字
没有自由吾宁死
结束CARIEMA的统治
带着伤准备迫降
我穿过一层层热浪
把速度提到超过了声音
接近了光我不慌张
我鼓足了勇气加大了马力
闯进时空漩涡的中央
眼前一黑当我醒来
竟然穿越回到过去的时光
CARIEMA
Limpid, fresh, energetic,
reality or just a reverie
Some shit did happen here
we gotta do something to save this planet
Find a TV
Again the Cariema"s drama,
boss Oprama Bonald gonna conquer somewhere like a hunter overdose on marijuana
**** this Cariema
The evilest hydra
The building still shaking while i am watching this evilshow
a bomb just dropped on my block
Guess it"s time to stop this mad ******
Gotta change the past to save the future
The world is collapsing now
another war is coming
CD Revolution
Paratroopers from the future
We travel back in time
Hope"s coming sooner
See these monstrous monsters
Mr. Uncle Mas
With this

t stop
like they never did in the past
Many guys are still thinkin they could
speak for and fight for their citizens
But the wars are toward civilians
They r like bugs
The eggs will hatch into larvae but mua
oh dont worry we gonna handle this
and we about to
go on a brand new trip
to solve it in this time zone
Say people now follow us to
**** wit the criminals
And their name is
CARIEMA
